attributes.action: stop the closure of holy family church pontefract
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
there are a few catholic churches that will be closed this year my main concern being the holy family one in pontefract, my children attend a catholic primary in pontefract and use this church regular as do many worshipers this has deeply upset alot of people and the whole school etc i dont attend church but i know people that do and it will be sad for them my children especially and so do i enjoy the school xmas and easter plays which they perform in the church its amazing and loads love to watch them it gives a better religous meaning
id love the churches to stay open its such a shame that they have to close due to the lack of people attending mass on a sunday etc please help keep these open

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
